alert.note: Alert for Reynolds (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 16 at 7:35PM CDT until May 18 at 7:27AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Missouri... Black River near Annapolis. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black River near Annapolis. * WHEN...Until Thursday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 9.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 8.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:15 PM CDT Tuesday was 12.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 5.3 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Thu Fri Sat Sun Mon Black River Annapolis 8.0 9.9 5.5 5.3 5.3 5.3 MSG &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
